body_html:
"Very different" comment was before I found other issue with the order of elemwise sum and nonlinearity in caffe conversion. Without it overall the highest per-pixel error was on the order of 1e-7, so it's not significant at all.
I don't believe this issue to be very important, just that it behaves not like you would expect, when you're working with float32 precision.

body:
"Very different" comment was before I found other issue with the order of elemwise sum and nonlinearity in caffe conversion. Without it overall the highest per-pixel error was on the order of 1e-7, so it's not significant at all.
I don't believe this issue to be very important, just that it behaves not like you would expect, when you're working with float32 precision.
